abstract: Michelle Obama, in her last commencement address as first lady, addresses graduates of City College of New York in speech celebrating immigrants and warning against leaders who demonize and dehumanize entire groups of people for political gain.

headline.print_headline: First Lady Celebrates Immigration in Commencement Speech at City College
headline.main: Michelle Obama Denounces Donald Trump in CUNY Commencement Speech

snippet: In her final address to college graduates as first lady, Mrs. Obama warned of “leaders who demonize and dehumanize entire groups of people.”
lead_paragraph: In her final address to college graduates as first lady, Mrs. Obama warned of “leaders who demonize and dehumanize entire groups of people.”
